snippet: Only a transnational grass-roots movement can save the E.U.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Daniel Cohn-Bendit and Felix Marquardt, co-founders of Europeans Now, argues the time is right for a transnational, grass-roots movement to save the European Union from dissolution and irrelevancy; holds while time of the nation-state is declining, movement should strive to retain the particular successes of each country.

byline.original: By DANIEL COHN-BENDIT and FELIX MARQUARDT

lead_paragraph: Only a transnational grass-roots movement can save the E.U.

headline.main: The Fix for Europe: People Power
headline.print_headline: The Fix for Europe: People Power
